content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in Mannheim to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. Let's indeed discuss the rental price. What would you consider a fair price for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. I'm looking for a place that is not only comfortable but also provides a secure living environment. Regarding the price, I would like to propose 800 Euro per month, all-inclusive. This would cover all utilities and any additional costs. Is this something we can work with?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hassan, your proposal for 800 Euro per month, all-inclusive, is an interesting starting point. However, considering the size and location of the apartment, as well as the current market rates, I was hoping for a slightly higher offer. Would you be willing to negotiate a bit further?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Certainly, Mister Heine. I am open to discussing a higher offer. Please tell me what you believe to be a fair price for this apartment, and we can work towards a mutually agreeable solution.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your flexibility, Hassan. Based on my assessment of the market and the amenities provided, I would be looking for a price closer to 1000 Euro per month, all-inclusive. This would reflect the value of the apartment and the services included. What are your thoughts on this?
name: Heinrich Heine
